solution_line_template: If all {num_stoplights_route1} stoplights are red, the first route will take {time_route1_all_green} + {num_stoplights_route1}*{time_added_per_red_light} = <<{time_route1_all_green}+{num_stoplights_route1}*{time_added_per_red_light}={time_route1_all_red}>>{time_route1_all_red} minutes.
Thus, the first route will take {time_route1_all_red}-{time_route2} = <<{time_route1_all_red}-{time_route2}={time_difference}>>{time_difference} minutes longer than the second route.
